reviewText: Watching this series is fun and inspirational.  The quests demonstrate how to manipulate fabric, or draw or dye fabric.  Maybe one shows how to quilt a quilt.  Very interesting if your interest is in quilting or art or both.  I get some great ideas from watching this series.

It's great to have my own copy of these TV episodes so I can watch/re-watch at a time that works for me.  There is a lot of fun ideas to try and enough detail in the demos so you can try new methods and crafts.
I have watched this video and cannot wait to get started! Will be ordering more Quilting Arts TV soon! My sister and I plan on trying some of these ideas. She really loved the series too.
